title: GGH Srikakulam Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 41 Driver, Nursing Orderly and Other Posts
description: Government General Hospital Srikakulam (GGH Srikakulam) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 41 Attenders, Book Bearer, Lab Attendants, Assistant Librarians, ECG Technicians, Data Entry Operators, Carpenters, Nursing Orderlies, and Other Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, Any Degree, Post Graduation, 12th, Diploma, ITI can grab this chance and apply for the GGH Srikakulam Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selec...
